records.Name: Stationary Bike
records.Description__c: A 30-minute workout on a stationary bike can burn 300 or more calories, depending on intensity.

records.Name: Running
records.Description__c: A 120-pound person burns about 11.4 calories per minute. So if that person runs a 10-minute mile, they'll burn 114 calories. If that person weighed 180 pounds, the calorie burn goes up to 17 calories per minute.

records.Name: Stairmaster
records.Description__c: Total caloric expenditure on the StairMaster depends on how long you work out. For example, a 160-lb. person burns about 360 calories in 30 minutes and 980 calories in 90 minutes.
